law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 236, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 563, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 314, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 7. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1599c-17, 1599d-6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Enforcement of law -- Inspections -- Access to records -- Administrative regulations -- Hearings.
